availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Shadrach Combs (Breathitt County, Kentucky,Pvt, Corp 14th Cav. Capt. 3 forks battalion)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, soldier. Private and corporal in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from February 13, 1863 to March 24, 1864. Captain in the Three Forks Battalion (U.S.A.) from October 7, 1864 to July 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 391.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 784.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0129.
